divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside looking up at the stars when I saw a light traveling SE at a slow rate (compared to a shooting star), it was smaller than the stars and not extremely bright (which made me feel it was further than the stars I had been examining) it did not flash and there were no red or green lights flashing. It went slowly across the sky and I had to keep blinking to keep track of it. I watched closely because it looked as if it were going to hit a star and then it veered and the was gone. A few minutes later I saw an airplane (flashing red and green lights going north). I found this website when I googled to see if all airplanes have flashing colored lights or had to have flashing lights period because this did not flash. this is probably nothing but I thought I would share.
Summary: {nd} bright light going across sky...seemed to be further than some stars
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around September 27th 2013
